(My apologies for my mistake)
Before transforming into gun mode Sixshot smacks Shuko upside the head.
Sixshot: You idiot! Never underestimate the power of someone witht the name 
Prime. Megatron did and you know what happened.

Ares: I am gonna kicks somebodies ass today.
